summary: a follower who is by all accounts completely expendable but thats what makes it so great...
descriptionHtml:
i have been searching the nexus for months looking high and low for a throw away follower and there seems to be none so i made my own i added myself into the game for use as a basic follower to be used for the hard quests the ones your follower will probably get killed on. the whole idea is he can die and is a nice addition to the inhabitants of skyrim. 
-----------------------------------------------------------
gear
full dwarven except the helm
dawnbreaker 
-----------------------------------------------------------    

i always wanted to live in skyrim and now i can. and don\'t forget to visit me on youtube yea thats right you can watch my videos and then take your aggravation out on me ingame :) 
http://www.youtube.com/user/mebardock


location 
whiterun on the bench next to the shrine to talos
author: mebardock
